goal: As the umbrella organisation for 22 local Chambers of Commerce - representing more than 50 percent of private sector jobs in Scotland - Scottish Chambers of Commerce has built a reputation as Scotlandâ€™s premier voice for business at national and international level.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Competition, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
